name: MedicineMemory
0:
”Alexa, tell medicine memory I took my medicine”
”Alexa, ask medicine memory how long has it been”
”Alexa, ask medicine memory for a time check”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: medicine memory
des:
This skill keeps track of the last time you took your medicine. 
To get started say "Alexa, tell medicine memory I took my medicine"
To check how much time has gone by "Alexa ask medicine memory how long"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
